The once-powerful French politician was considered a step away from the French presidency when he was accused of sexually assaulting a New York City hotel maid in May 2011.
As NPR's Eleanor Beardsley reports, his fall from grace isn't over yet.

He settled the civil case with the New York hotel maid out of court earlier this year and appeared to be rebuilding his life.
